meanings.sent1: Her ventriloquistic skills amazed the audience during the show.
meanings.sent2: The ventriloquistic performance was so realistic that many thought the puppet was speaking on its own.
meanings.sent3: The ventriloquistic dummy made everyone laugh with its witty jokes.
meanings.sent4: His ventriloquistic voice seemed to come from a different dimension.
meanings.sent5: The ventriloquistic act left a lasting impression on the spectators.

meanings.sent1: The ventriloquistic voice of the puppeteer was skillfully controlled.
meanings.sent2: The ventriloquistic effect created an illusion of multiple voices in the room.
meanings.sent3: The ventriloquistic performance at the talent show was a big hit.
meanings.sent4: The ventriloquistic sound echoed through the theater, captivating the audience.
meanings.sent5: The ventriloquistic nature of the act added an element of mystery to the show.
